description:
The lawyers at Nelson MacNeil Rayfield Trial Attorneys, P.C., have more than 70 years of collective legal and trial experience. The firm represents individuals and their loved ones who have been injured in all types of accidents, including car accidents.

The firm exclusively represents plaintiffs in personal injury cases throughout Oregon. By focusing on a narrow area of law, the firm's attorneys are able to provide superior representation through every step in the process, from conducting thorough investigations to negotiating favorable settlements or skillfully navigating court procedure at trial. They handle all communications with insurance companies on behalf of their clients. The firm knows that insurance companies may try to take advantage of vulnerable clients, and the firm's attorneys work hard to get fair compensation for their clients' pain.

The firm's attorneys compassionately guide clients through the legal process. They work closely with their clients to uncover all relevant facts and create a legal strategy tailored to the specific circumstances surrounding your accident. At the same time they work to negotiate favorable settlements, they also work to prepare the case for trial in the event a reasonable settlement cannot be achieved. By handling every legal aspect of the claim, the firm allows clients to focus on the future.

Nelson MacNeil Rayfield Trial Attorneys, P.C., is a law firm dedicated to placing its clients in the best possible position for proper compensation after car accidents or other type of accidents. The firm's lawyers are available for weekend and evening appointments upon request, and if you are unable to visit one of the firm's offices, the lawyers can travel to you.
